title: What the Nvidia-OpenAI deal means for the economy
description: The Nvidia-OpenAI deal is about boosting the artificial intelligence dominance of the U.S. economy. Productivity is a key focus area.
content: On Monday, Jensen Huang, a cofounder and CEO of Nvidia, along with Sam Altman, one of the creators of OpenAI, which developed the popular AI platform ChatGPT, announced that Nvidia would invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI. The money will be used to ... [3218 chars]

title: Could These ‘Deepfake’ Whales Aid Conservation Efforts?
description: Ecologists are increasingly tapping into artificial intelligence to help aid conservation, but many are grappling with how to use these energy-hungry systems without fueling future environmental problems.
content: It’s a hyper-modern problem on social media: A video or image of an animal doing something seemingly unbelievable in the wild pops up on your feed, only for you to realize it is, in fact, unbelievable. That’s because many of these images and videos—f... [14190 chars]

title: Stock Futures Rise as Alibaba Boosts AI Sentiment: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- US stocks are set to resume their rally after a pledge by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. for more spending and an upbeat forecast from Micron Technology Inc. reinforced optimism over artificial intelligence.
content:
(Bloomberg) — US stocks are set to resume their rally after a pledge by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. for more spending and an upbeat forecast from Micron Technology Inc. reinforced optimism over artificial intelligence.

title: China's Alibaba teams up with Nvidia on AI robot tech
description: Alibaba and Nvidia have announced a significant collaboration in AI technology to accelerate the development of humanoid robots. This partnership involves integrating Nvidia's physical AI software stack into Alibaba's cloud division. The announcement coincided with Alibaba's shares surging after CEO Eddie Wu revealed plans to increase spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Samsung Unveils 'AI Home': Revolutionizing Smart Living
description: Samsung introduced 'AI Home', a future-forward smart living solution that integrates artificial intelligence across appliances and services. Showcased in Mumbai, it highlights features like automatic lighting, adaptive air conditioning, and intelligent washing machine cycles, supported by robust security measures, enhancing user convenience and energy efficiency.

title: Japan's Nikkei closes at record as AI rally helps overcome early losses
description: Japan's Nikkei share average closed at a record high on Wednesday, fighting back from early losses on optimism buoyed by investments in artificial intelligence.

title: Health AI standards: 6 groups to know
description: As health artificial intelligence use grows, groups are racing to offer standards that might ensure safety and boost adoption

title: Alibaba Unveils Qwen3-Max, Its Most Powerful AI Model, to Take on OpenAI's GPT-5
description: Alibaba also said it plans to open its first data centres in Brazil, France and the Netherlands as it accelerates its global strategy for artificial intelligence.

title: From hype to impact: How AI and human collaboration are redefining customer experience
description: Companies are adopting Artificial Intelligence to improve customer experience. Many struggle with implementation. Ozonetel's Chaitanya Chokkareddy explains AI-human collaboration. He suggests integrating AI across workflows. Companies should map AI to specific outcomes. Human touch remains crucial for complex issues. AI should handle routine tasks. By 2026, customer-centric design will be key. Trust, transparency, and continuous learning are important.
